hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Qatadah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“If anyone of you is charged with taking care of his brother (after death), let him shroud him well.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَا يُسْتَحَبُّ مِنَ الْكَفَنِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning what is recommended in shrouding
